PHF League Information

Source: R/phf_league_info.R
phf_league_info.Rd

PHF League Information per year

Usage

phf_league_info(season = most_recent_phf_season())

Arguments

season

Season (YYYY) to pull the league info and IDs for. Season is the concluding year in XXXX-YY format

Value

A named list of data frames: seasons, divisions, teams, league, officials, brackets

Examples

# \donttest{
  try(phf_league_info(season = 2023))
#> $seasons
#> ── PHF Seasons Information from PremierHockeyFederation.com ────────────────────
#> ℹ Data updated: 2023-01-05 02:38:39 UTC
#> # A tibble: 8 × 5
#>      id name    type        view_setti…¹ $show…² $wild…³ $wild…⁴ $reco…⁵ leagu…⁶

#> 1  4667 2022-23 League Play            3 TRUE          0       0 TRUE        100
#> 2  3372 2021-22 League Play            3 TRUE          0       0 TRUE        100
#> 3  2779 2020-21 League Play            2 TRUE          0       0 TRUE        100
#> 4  1950 2019-20 League Play            2 TRUE          0       0 TRUE        100
#> 5  2047 2018-19 League Play            2 TRUE          0       0 TRUE        100
#> 6  2046 2017-18 League Play            2 TRUE          0       0 TRUE        100
#> 7  2045 2016-17 League Play            2 TRUE          0       0 TRUE        100
